explains: v. 制定，通过；扮演，表演；使发生，付诸实际

sentences.en: It is imperative that governments around the world enact laws to protect the environment at home and abroad.
sentences.cn: 世界各国政府必须制定法律来保护国内外的环境。

sentences.en: It is imperative that governments around the world should enact laws to protect the environment both at home and abroad.
sentences.cn: 世界各国政府必须制定法律来保护国内外环境。

sentences.en: Members of the English Civil War Society will re-enact the battle.
sentences.cn: 英格兰内战协会的成员将再次展现那场战争。
